summary: The module assembles an HTML gallery of example plots for the MSS WMS service. It processes generated images, extracts metadata such as levels and times, creates markdown snippets, and writes documentation pages that showcase linear and vertical section plots along with import instructions.
business_intent: To provide a ready‑to‑use visual documentation set that demonstrates the capabilities of the MSS WMS, helping users understand available plot types, required parameters, and how to integrate them into their workflows.
